home.title: I am React developer
home.subtitle_1: I am proactive, considerate and responsible.
home.subtitle_2: I am always looking to improve in my field, and help my colleagues.

about.first_part: My name is Lautaro Gonzalez, FrontEnd and Mobile developer. I mostly code in React
about.second_part: I love programming, especially when I learn new things, it's a constant innovation.
about.third_part: Mi path began a little more than 5 years ago on high school. I started studying C, then I moved onto Javascript, along with a lot of technical knowledge.
about.quarter_part: Then came Henry, a bootcamp that brought me many web design and backend developing tools.
about.fifth_part: In 2021 I prioritized React and that got me into my first formal working experience, in which I've been for a year now.
about.sixty_part: Those who shared this path with me had described me as proactive, always looking to learn more. I'm curious and I enjoy working in a team, always looking for positive interactions.
